alert.note: Alert for De Baca; Guadalupe; Quay; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 6:58PM MDT until October 02 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Southwestern Quay County in east central New Mexico... Southeastern Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 658 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Santa Rosa to near Ramon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Fort Sumner, House, Tolar, Yeso, Puerto De Luna, Taiban, Sumner Lake State Park, and Sumner Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 273 and 276. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 291 and 351. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
